thread.title: Matthew Stork
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Matthew Stork

author: Matthew Stork
title: Matthew Stork
text: Completely satisfied customer! Excellent customer service provided to us from 2 different Gardner-White locations. Excellent service from Sales Guru David White from the Auburn Hills location helped us with a new bed. and from the Macomb Twp. location, Brittany Fisher helped us with some new living room pieces. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND both of these Sales Consultants! Great job David & Brittany!
